history.proof: intros T f v H1 H2. apply forallI with (L := LNT). - apply H1. - apply H2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)

Premises:
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNT : fol.System LNT -> fol.Formula LNT -> Prop
forallH : nat -> fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT
System = fol.System LNT : Type
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
In_freeVarSys : forall L : Language, nat -> fol.System L -> Prop
forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
orI1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
andE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T f
nnI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH (notH f))
nnE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f
folReplace.reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
forallSimp : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
andE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T g
orI2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
cp1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
cp2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g))
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNT) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
orSys : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (orH f g)) h
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f
folReplace.impForall : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v f1) (fol.forallH L v f2))
folReplace.reduceExist : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.existH L v f1) (fol.existH L v f2))
folReplace.reduceForall : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.forallH L v f1) (fol.forallH L v f2))
folReplace.iffExist : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (fol.existH L v f1) (fol.existH L v f2))
forallE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t)
noMiddle : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (orH (notH f) f)
folReplace.reduceCloseList : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall v : nat, In v l -> ~ In_freeVarSys L v T) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (closeList L l f1) (closeList L l f2))
subAll.reduceSubAll : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (map : nat -> fol.Term L) (A B : fol.Formula L), (forall v : nat, ~ In_freeVarSys L v T) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L A B) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (subAll.subAllFormula L A map) (subAll.subAllFormula L B map))
FA2 : forall (L : Language) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L A) -> Prf L nil (fol.impH L A (fol.forallH L v A))
GEN : forall (L : Language) (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In v (freeVarListFormula L Axm) -> Prf L Axm A -> Prf L Axm (fol.forallH L v A)
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : fol.Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : fol.Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
folLogic.contradiction : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.notH L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
folLogic.impE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
folLogic.iffI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g)
iffSym : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L g f)

```coq
intros T f v H1 H2.
apply forallI with (L := LNT).
- exact H1.
- exact H2.
Qed.```

original: intros T f v H1 H2. apply forallI with (L := LNT). - apply H1. - apply H2.
